Articles.Content:
What if ... the Mind Boggling question of all time .. Kermans Have always Imagined Many Different Goals in their Lives , Trying to reach them , and make them true''

-Fredison Kerman-

Suggestion 1

So What if..In the Kerbal System.. there was....     2 Different Races? ... I know this idea might seem crazy or stupid, But after playing KSP for several hours , i've been wondering Why is there only 1 Living thing on this Entire Planet? ,Except for Plants? Are they Vegeterians? .. Eating a bunch of tree Leaves? What if there was another Species in the System? ... I Know this might seem Unrealistic at all and would throw out the point of making the game as realistic as possible , But..  In Reality the Universe is Big Its Vast .. The Observable Universe Only is 99,000,000,000 Light years and could Hold Potentialy Hundreds or maybe even Thousands or if so Millions and Billions... The Universe is Endless.. Thats why i think this idea is Realistic

Suggestion 2

So What if.. Kerbals had or Multiple Space programs on different planets like for example , a Space center on Kerbin and one in Duna?.. I guess this idea isnt gonna be looked after all because it doesn't Seem to intresting .. But i find it.

but i dont even know if theres anyone intrested in these crazy ideas or even wanna read them

if you did then thanks for that i really appericiate it and if you are a modmaker this is a idea for you

I have Many other things in my mind i wish i could say more in this thread

-Taco Kerman-

Welcome to the forums

While new species could be interesting, I don't know how much purpose it'd serve. If it was something at Kerbin, it would just take up CPU space. If it was alien, that's not really in the scope of the game. There are easter eggs hinting at aliens, but I think anything more would be detrimental to the game.

As for more launchpads, that is a thing. The mod extraplanetary launchpads or something like that.

12 hours ago, Choctofliatrio2.0 said:

Welcome to the forums

While new species could be interesting, I don't know how much purpose it'd serve. If it was something at Kerbin, it would just take up CPU space. If it was alien, that's not really in the scope of the game. There are easter eggs hinting at aliens, but I think anything more would be detrimental to the game.

As for more launchpads, that is a thing. The mod extraplanetary launchpads or something like that.
